metadata.title: USN-6734-1 -- libvirt vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Alexander Kuznetsov discovered that libvirt incorrectly handled certain API calls. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause libvirt to crash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2024-1441)  It was discovered that libvirt incorrectly handled certain RPC library API calls. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause libvirt to crash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2024-2494)  It was discovered that libvirt incorrectly handled detaching certain host interfaces. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause libvirt to crash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2024-2496)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6734-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libvirt-clients-qemu - 9.6.0-1ubuntu1.1 libvirt-dev - 9.6.0-1ubuntu1.1 libvirt-wireshark - 9.6.0-1ubuntu1.1 libvirt-daemon-driver-qemu - 9.6.0-1ubuntu1.1 libvirt-login-shell - 9.6.0-1ubuntu1.1 libvirt-daemon-system-sysv - 9.6.0-1ubuntu1.1 libvirt-daemon-driver-lxc - 9.6.0-1ubuntu1.1 libnss-libvirt - 9.6.0-1ubuntu1.1 libvirt-daemon - 9.6.0-1ubuntu1.1 libvirt-daemon-config-nwfilter - 9.6.0-1ubuntu1.1 libvirt-daemon-driver-storage-iscsi-direct - 9.6.0-1ubuntu1.1 libvirt-daemon-system - 9.6.0-1ubuntu1.1 libvirt-l10n - 9.6.0-1ubuntu1.1 libvirt-clients - 9.6.0-1ubuntu1.1 libvirt-daemon-driver-storage-zfs - 9.6.0-1ubuntu1.1 libvirt-daemon-driver-xen - 9.6.0-1ubuntu1.1 libvirt-daemon-driver-vbox - 9.6.0-1ubuntu1.1 libvirt-daemon-driver-storage-gluster - 9.6.0-1ubuntu1.1 libvirt-daemon-config-network - 9.6.0-1ubuntu1.1 libvirt0 - 9.6.0-1ubuntu1.1 libvirt-daemon-system-systemd - 9.6.0-1ubuntu1.1 libvirt-sanlock - 9.6.0-1ubuntu1.1 libvirt-daemon-driver-storage-rbd - 9.6.0-1ubuntu1.1 libvirt-doc - 9.6.0-1ubuntu1.1 No subscription required
